summary: A rat who can cook makes an unusual alliance with a young kitchen worker at a famous restaurant.
cast: Patton Oswalt|Ian Holm|Lou Romano|Brian Dennehy|Peter Sohn|Peter O'Toole|Brad Garrett|Janeane Garofalo|Will Arnett|Julius Callahan|James Remar|John Ratzenberger|Teddy Newton|Tony Fucile|Jake Steinfeld|Brad Bird|Stéphane Roux|Jack Bird|Andrea Boerries|Marco Boerries|Lindsey Collins|Thomas Keller|Bradford Lewis|Lori Richardson|Michael Giacchino|Patrick Pinney
title: Ratatouille
